parts.text: {"word":"replayed","priority":"★☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(録音・録画されたものを) 再生する、リプレイする","english_definition":"to play (something recorded) again.","examples":[{"sentence":"We replayed the goal several times in slow motion.","translation":"そのゴールシーンをスローモーションで何度も再生した。"},{"sentence":"The referee replayed the video to check the foul.","translation":"審判はファウルを確認するためにビデオを再生した。"},{"sentence":"Can you replay that last part? I didn't quite hear it.","translation":"最後の部分をもう一度再生してもらえますか？よく聞こえませんでした。"}],"collocations":["replay a video (ビデオを再生する)","replay a recording (録音を再生する)","replay a game (試合を再試合する)","replay a scene (シーンを再生する)"],"synonyms":["play again","rewind and play","repeat","show again"],"antonyms":["record","fast forward"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(試合などを) 再試合する、再戦する","english_definition":"to play (a game or match) again.","examples":[{"sentence":"The teams replayed the game due to the tie.","translation":"同点のため、チームは再試合を行った。"},{"sentence":"They had to replay the final because of the protest.","translation":"抗議があったため、彼らは決勝を再試合しなければならなかった。"}],"collocations":["replay a match (試合を再試合する)","replay a final (決勝を再試合する)"],"synonyms":["have a rematch","play over again"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(心の中で) 再体験する、追体験する","english_definition":"to experience or live through (an event or situation) again in one's mind.","examples":[{"sentence":"She replayed the argument in her head all night.","translation":"彼女は一晩中、頭の中でその議論を何度も追体験した。"},{"sentence":"He replayed the moment of the accident over and over.","translation":"彼は事故の瞬間を何度も何度も追体験した。"}],"collocations":["replay a memory (記憶を追体験する)","replay an event (出来事を追体験する)"],"synonyms":["relive","re-experience","reminisce about"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"「re-」（再び）+ 「play」（遊ぶ、演奏する、再生する）","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/riːˈpleɪd/","syllables":"re-played"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["replay","replays"],"past_simple":"replayed","past_participle":"replayed","present_participle":"replaying"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**replayed**」は動詞「replay」の過去形・過去分詞形です。主に、録音・録画されたものを再び再生すること、試合などを再試合すること、そして心の中で過去の出来事を追体験することを意味します。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I replayed the game, it was very exciting.","correct":"✓ I replayed the game; it was very exciting. / ✓ I replayed the game, and it was very exciting.","note":"独立した2つの文をコンマだけで繋ぐのは誤りです。セミコロンまたは接続詞を使用する必要があります。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He replayed the memory in his mind.","correct":"✓ He replayed the memory in his head.","note":"「頭の中で」は "in his head" が一般的です。 "in his mind" も間違いではありませんが、よりフォーマルな表現です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["replay (名詞: 再生、再試合)","replayer (名詞: 再生する人/物)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低頻度 (Relatively low frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**replayed**」は「replay」という動詞の過去形または過去分詞形で、「もう一度再生する」または「再試合する」という意味です。ビデオやオーディオをもう一度見たり聞いたりするときに使います。また、試合をもう一度行うときにも使います。さらに、過去の出来事を心の中で何度も思い出すときにも使われます。例えば、「I replayed the video of the concert.（コンサートのビデオを再生した）」や「She replayed the conversation in her head.（彼女は頭の中で会話を何度も繰り返した）」のように使います。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"She **replayed** the song because she liked it so much.","translation":"彼女はその曲がとても好きだったので、もう一度再生した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"再生する"},{"sentence":"The team **replayed** the match after a controversial call.","translation":"物議を醸す判定の後、チームは試合を再試合した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"再試合する"},{"sentence":"He **replayed** the scene in his mind, trying to understand what went wrong.","translation":"彼は何がうまくいかなかったのか理解しようと、頭の中でその場面を何度も追体験した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"追体験する"}]}
